allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Vesla Rent-a-Car Backend API

- Express.js + TypeScript server
- PostgreSQL database (Neon cloud)
- JWT authentication with bcrypt
- REST API endpoints for:
  * Authentication (register/login)
  * Vehicles (CRUD + availability)
  * Bookings (create/confirm/list)
  * Invoices (generate/retrieve)
  * Customers (manage profiles)
- Auto-initializing database schema
- Environment-based configuration
- CORS enabled for mobile/web clients

Server runs on port 3001
Database: Neon PostgreSQL serverless

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor: Separate backend into independent repository

Major architectural change to improve separation of concerns:

Backend Changes:
- Removed embedded backend from mobile app repository
- Backend now lives in separate repo: client-backend
- Deleted backend/src/, backend/package.json
- Mobile app is now pure frontend code

Documentation:
- Added ARCHITECTURE.md with system diagram
- Added README_REFACTOR.md with migration notes
- Updated CLAUDE.md with new repository structure
- Documented 3-tier architecture (Mobile â†’ API â†’ Database)

Benefits:
- Independent deployment of frontend and backend
- Better security (backend code not in mobile app)
- Cleaner separation of concerns
- Backend can serve multiple clients

Backend Repository: https://github.com/migueldeguzman/client-backend.git

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix booking creation and add document number generation

Backend Changes:
- Fixed booking.controller.ts to use snake_case column names (payment_method, terms_accepted)
- Added createdAt/updatedAt timestamps to prevent null constraint violations
- Fixed booking_addons INSERT to match existing table schema
- Commented out notification preferences (table doesn''t exist yet)
- Created document-number.ts utility for sequential number generation (BOOK/REC/AGR)
- Updated queries to use snake_case: booking_id instead of bookingId

Bug Fixes:
- Resolved "column paymentMethod does not exist" error
- Resolved "null value in column updatedAt" error
- Resolved "column id is of type uuid but expression is of type text" error

Testing:
- Added test-booking-flow.ts for end-to-end booking validation
- All tests passing: Login â†’ Create Booking â†’ Confirm â†’ Verify

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
